title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Saurons army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Oldboy
plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Train to Busan
plot: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

title: The Handmaiden
plot: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

title: Memories of Murder
plot: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

title: The Host
plot: A monster emerges from Seouls Han River and begins attacking people. One victims loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.

title: Burning
plot: Jong-su, a part-time worker, bumps into Hae-mi while delivering, who used to live in the same neighborhood. Hae-mi asks him to look after her cat while shes on a trip to Africa.

title: The Wailing
plot: A stranger arrives in a little village and soon after a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman is drawn into the incident and is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

title: Mother
plot: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girls horrific murder.

title: I Saw the Devil
plot: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

title: Spirited Away
plot: During her familys move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: Your Name
plot: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

title: Akira
plot: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by two teenagers and a group of psychics.

title: Seven Samurai
plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

title: Rashomon
plot: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurais ghost, and a woodcutter.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
plot: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: Battle Royale
plot: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

title: Princess Mononoke
plot: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigamis curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest, he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: Tokyo Story
plot: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city but receive little attention.

title: Audition
plot: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

plot: Someday...

plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

plot: Eight years after the Jokers reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

plot: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassins trade.

title: The Sixth Sense
plot: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: The Shining
plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

title: The Departed
plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

plot: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

plot: The film tells the story of the planet Arrakis, the only place in the universe where the most valuable resource, "melange" sand, is mined.

plot: Peter Parker asks Doctor Strange to cast a spell to make the world forget that he is Spider-Man.

plot: It is a story about a group of superhumans known as the Eternals, who were sent to Earth to protect humanity from the malevolent Deviants.

plot: Shang-Chi confronts his familys past, including his powerful father who wields the magical Ten Rings.

plot: A drama film that reflects on the identity and history of Kazakhstan through the eyes of its people.

plot: A thriller-drama film about a poor family who infiltrates the lives of a wealthy household, leading to unexpected consequences.

plot: A horror-thriller film set on a speeding train during a zombie outbreak, where passengers fight for survival.

plot: A mystery-thriller film about a man who is inexplicably imprisoned for 15 years and seeks revenge upon his release.

title: The Handmaiden
plot: An erotic thriller-drama film set in 1930s Korea, revolving around a conman who tries to swindle a Japanese heiress but falls in love with her maid.

plot: A crime-drama film based on the true story of the hunt for South Korea's first serial killer in the 1980s.

plot: A mystery-drama film about a young man who becomes suspicious of his wealthy friend's mysterious hobby, leading to a tense confrontation.

plot: A horror-mystery film about a small village plagued by a series of mysterious deaths, rumored to be caused by a supernatural entity.

plot: A historical drama film based on the true story of a taxi driver who helps a German journalist cover the Gwangju Uprising in 1980s South Korea.

plot: Dangal tells the true story of Mahavir Singh Phogat, an amateur wrestler who trains his daughters Geeta Phogat and Babita Kumari to become world-class wrestlers against all odds.

plot: Baahubali: The Beginning follows the story of Shivudu, who learns about his heritage and embarks on a journey to reclaim the throne of his kingdom, facing numerous challenges along the way.

plot: PK is a satirical comedy-drama film that follows an alien who lands on Earth and questions various societal norms and religious beliefs, leading to thought-provoking and humorous encounters.

plot: 3 Idiots is a coming-of-age comedy-drama film that follows the friendship of three engineering students at an Indian university and their unconventional approach to education and life.

title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
plot: Bajrangi Bhaijaan tells the story of a young mute Pakistani girl who gets lost in India and finds herself stranded. An Indian man undertakes the task of reuniting her with her family against all odds.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
plot: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion continues the story of Shivudu as he learns about his past and confronts the conspiracies surrounding the kingdom of Mahishmati, culminating in an epic battle.

title: Padmaavat
plot: Padmaavat is a period drama film based on the epic poem Padmavat by Malik Muhammad Jayasi, which tells the story of the Rajput queen Padmavati, her husband Maharawal Ratan Singh, and the Muslim ruler Alauddin Khilji.

title: Lagaan
plot: Lagaan is a sports drama film set in colonial India, where a group of villagers in British-ruled India challenge their oppressors to a cricket match to avoid paying excessive taxes, showcasing themes of unity, courage, and determination.
